summary: This bill, the ATF Data and Anti-Trafficking Accountability Act (ATF DATA Act), mandates the Attorney General, through the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF), to publish detailed data sets regarding firearm trace data. This includes aggregated trace data, licensee information, time-to-crime analysis, data on multiple sales and privately made firearms, and an overview of firearms trafficking patterns. The goal is to increase transparency and accountability related to firearms sales and trafficking.
